text: Talia Shire (; born April 25, 1946) is an American actress. She is best known for her roles as Connie Corleone in The Godfather, and Adrianna ("Adrian") Pennino (later Balboa) in the Rocky series. Shire is the sister of Francis Ford Coppola, the mother of actor Jason Schwartzman, and the aunt of actor Nicolas Cage.Talia Shire Biography (1946â€“1994) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City
